title: Is it true or false that an American Press Institute study found that tech savvy people use traditional media far less than anyone else? - Quora

response.answer_text: A survey in 2013 by the Media Insight Project carried out on the initiative of the API seemed to show that technically knowledgeable consumers used more gadgets to get the news and enjoyed high-tech gadgets more, but they were no more or less likely than others to use traditional media. I haven’t read the complete study, though.
